title: Agritechnica Asia and Horti Asia 2022
description: Horti ASIA ‒ the 7th international trade show for horticultural and floricultural production and processing technology. This is the region’s largest trade exhibition for smart horticulture in Asia showcasing the latest innovation of horticultural production to serve the significant growers’ challenges in the next decade mainly due to the increasing labor shortage, more competition, and therefore, the requirement to reduce production costs.
